column2: What's good for the goose is good for the gander. If Heard is an ambassador even though she abused Depp then he's the true victim ambassador
column26: ACLU to ask Johnny Depp to be a Domestic Violence Ambassador!
column33: ACLU to ask Johnny Depp to be a Domestic Violence Ambassador!
column34: In the past few years Amber Heard has been an ambassador for domestic violence for the ACLU. This was a wrongful position for we know now that she was the actual abuser! Her position not only undermined the domestic violence cause but has inflicted painful feelings for DV survivors. One of the main victims of Amber heard's domestic violence was Johnny Depp. Johnny Depp has done more than Amber Heard for charitable foundations and domestic violence survivors everywhere! It is requested that the ACLU strike the fact that Amber Heard was an ambassador off the record and replace her with Johnny Depp the real victim!
